dataQuery.sqlStatement: select distinct OD_SC_TRANSMISSION_STATUS ,od_sc_inspection_no ,od_sc_agent ,od_sc_od_vendor_id ,od_sc_vendor ,od_sc_vendor_address ,od_sc_factory_id ,od_sc_factory ,od_sc_factory_addr||','||od_sc_fact_city||','||od_sc_factory_state||','||od_sc_origin_country as od_sc_factory_addr ,od_sc_region ,to_char(od_sc_ven_invoice_payment_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS od_sc_ven_invoice_payment_date ,to_char(od_sc_scheduled_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS od_sc_scheduled_date ,od_sc_grade from q_od_sc_vendor_audit_v where plan_name = 'OD_SC_VENDOR_AUDIT' and organization_name = 'ODPB Project' and od_sc_transmission_status = :P_TRAN_STATUS and trunc(creation_date) >= trunc(sysdate) - :P_NO_OF_DAYS ORDER BY 1,2,4,8
